title: User Registration with Valid Data
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully with valid username, email, and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Enter valid username, email, and password.
Submit the registration form.
Verify account is created and user is redirected to the dashboard or welcome page.

title: User Registration with Invalid Email Format
description: Verify the registration fails with an invalid email format and appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Enter valid username and password, but an invalid email format.
Submit the registration form.
Verify registration is blocked and an informative error message about invalid email is displayed.

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Check that a registered user can successfully log in using valid credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid username/email and password.
Click on the login button.
Verify that the user is authenticated and redirected to the dashboard.

title: User Login with Incorrect Password
description: Ensure login fails when a registered user enters an incorrect password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid username/email and incorrect password.
Click on the login button.
Verify that login is denied and an error message about incorrect password is displayed.

title: Session Persistence after Login
description: Verify the user session persists after page reload or browser close/open until user explicitly logs out.

steps.description: Log in with valid credentials.
Reload the page or close and reopen the browser.
Verify the user remains logged in and session data persists.

title: Logout Functionality
description: Check that the logout option terminates the session and returns the user to the login or home page.

steps.description: Log in to the application.
Click the logout button.
Verify user session is terminated and redirected to login or landing page.

title: Chat Interface Message Sending and Receiving
description: Validate that user can send a message via chat interface and receive AI responses powered by Gemini API with correct message display including typing indicators and markdown formatting.

steps.description: Open the chat interface after login.
Type a valid crypto trading question.
Send the message.
Verify typing indicator is shown while AI is responding.
Verify AI response includes relevant trading advice and rap-style summary with correct markdown formatting.

title: Chat Interface Handles Empty or Invalid Input
description: Ensure that the chat interface gracefully handles empty or invalid queries and shows appropriate error or guidance messages.

steps.description: Open chat interface.
Send empty message or invalid input such as special characters only.
Verify system displays helpful error message or prompts user to enter a valid query.

title: Real-Time Market Data Updates
description: Validate real-time price ticker updates for BTC, ETH, and SOL using Binance WebSocket and fallback to REST APIs, including 24h price changes display.

steps.description: Open the app dashboard displaying market ticker.
Verify price ticker shows current prices for BTC, ETH, SOL and 24h percentage changes.
Simulate websocket disconnection.
Verify price data continues updating using REST API fallback gracefully.

title: Portfolio Management CRUD Operations
description: Verify user can add, edit, delete cryptocurrency holdings to portfolio, and system calculates profit & loss correctly for multiple assets.

steps.description: Navigate to portfolio management page.
Add new crypto holdings with valid amount and price.
Verify new holdings are listed with correct value and total portfolio value is updated.
Edit existing holdings.
Verify changes reflected in portfolio summary and profit/loss recalculated.
Delete a holding.
Verify holding is removed and portfolio values updated.

title: Price Alerts Creation and Notifications
description: Ensure users can create custom price alerts with thresholds and receive notifications when target prices hit.

steps.description: Navigate to price alerts section.
Create a new price alert for a cryptocurrency with a target price.
Verify alert is saved and appears in alert list.
Simulate market price hitting alert threshold.
Verify user receives notification alert.

title: Interactive Charts with Technical Indicators
description: Verify that interactive charts render correctly with multiple selectable timeframes and technical indicators like RSI, MACD, EMA, Bollinger Bands using Chart.js.

steps.description: Navigate to crypto charts page.
Verify charts display correct historical price data.
Select different timeframes (1h, 24h, 7d, 1m).
Verify chart updates accordingly.
Enable/disable technical indicators (RSI, MACD, EMA, Bollinger Bands).
Verify indicators are properly rendered on the chart.

title: Trading Strategy Backtesting Accuracy
description: Ensure backtesting engine accurately simulates trading strategies RSI, MACD, EMA, and Bollinger Bands on historical data and displays correct performance metrics and trade history.

steps.description: Navigate to the trading strategy backtesting tool.
Select a strategy (e.g. RSI) and set strategy parameters.
Run backtest on historical data.
Verify backtest completes without errors.
Verify trade history and performance metrics (profit, win rate) are displayed and plausible.

title: Market Sentiment Dashboard Data Accuracy and Updates
description: Verify that the market sentiment dashboard correctly shows overall mood and confidence levels and updates in real-time.

steps.description: Open market sentiment dashboard.
Verify sentiment indicators (mood, confidence) are displayed for major cryptos.
Simulate market data updates.
Verify sentiment data refreshes accordingly.

title: Voice Command Recognition and Execution
description: Test the voice command feature correctly recognizes spoken commands and interacts with the AI assistant as expected.

steps.description: Activate voice command feature.
Speak a valid trading query, e.g., 'What is the current price of BTC?'
Verify the command is recognized, transcribed, and the AI provides an appropriate response.
Speak an unrecognized or unclear command.
Verify the system prompts user to repeat or clarify.

title: Theme Toggle and Persistence
description: Verify that toggling between dark and light themes updates the UI immediately and the userâ€™s choice persists across sessions.

steps.description: Toggle theme from light to dark.
Verify UI theme changes immediately.
Reload the application.
Verify the selected theme (dark) persists.
Toggle back to light theme and verify persistence again.

title: Persistent Chat History with Formatting and Typewriter Effect
description: Verify chat history is saved and restored with markdown formatting and typewriter effect for AI replies.

steps.description: Engage in chat session with multiple queries and AI responses.
Close and reopen the application.
Verify entire chat history loads correctly with markdown formatting applied.
Verify AI messages display typewriter effect on new responses.

title: Quick Action Buttons Functionality
description: Test that quick action buttons insert predefined queries and trigger AI responses correctly.

steps.description: Click on a quick action button for a common query.
Verify the query is inserted into the chat input and sent automatically or after user confirmation.
Verify AI returns a valid response to the quick query.

title: API Key Management and Validation
description: Validate users can securely add, update and remove their Gemini API keys and that invalid keys show proper error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to profile settings page.
Add a valid Gemini API key and save.
Verify key is saved successfully.
Add an invalid or malformed API key.
Verify validation error is displayed.
Remove existing API key.
Verify key is removed securely.

title: Mobile-Responsive Layout Verification
description: Ensure the application layout and interaction components render correctly and remain fully usable on various mobile screen sizes and orientations.

steps.description: Open application on various mobile devices or emulator with different screen sizes.
Verify all UI components are visible and correctly aligned.
Verify touch interactions are functional and easy to use.
Rotate screen orientation.
Verify UI adjusts correctly to landscape and portrait modes.

title: Performance Verification at 120fps
description: Test UI performance meets 120fps rendering target including GPU acceleration, passive event listeners, and smooth animations on typical hardware.

steps.description: Load the application on test hardware.
Perform typical user interactions: chat, theme toggle, navigation, chart viewing.
Using profiling tools, verify frame rate consistently meets or exceeds 120fps.
Verify no UI jank or lag during animations and interactions.
